name: Commuter
description:
A note from Bad Neighbor Games:

Instead of starting a crowdfunding campaign, we are giving you an enjoyable game for your money. The smaller games we are making will help support our team as we work on our larger passion project. Our goal is to provide you with fun and challenging games that allow a nice break from reality..
-Brian & John

Features

  • Collect power-ups to survive to the next level
  • Burn NOS to blast through traffic and get big air off ramps
  • Compete for highscores on the leaderboard
  • Unlock 13 more vehicles
  • Upgrade vehicles to increase maneuverability/survivability
  • Three unique biomes (desert, forest, and snow)

16 Playable Vehicles

Use Unique Special Abilities

Take Your Car Off Some Sweet Jumps



“I'm not sure people can connect to a commuter game in an age of working from home.”
-Tall Steve
